item.description:
It's that time again to party with a birthday beat.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This year's theme for Gady's birthday is STEAM! Yes, this is a costume party so start prepping now! This is about embracing your inner whatever and dressing the part!

Caution newbies: Anyone showing up without a costume will either put on whatever I hand them or be turned away at the door, no exceptions.

What gets you steamy? Gears, video games, vegetables, x-rated content, punk, Tesla? All these things combined?

We'll be doing potluck appetizers please and BYOB. I'll handle steaming the cake!

Gifts are neither required nor encouraged, none of us, including Gady, really needs more stuff.

Mark your calendar and please join in celebrating with us.

I will send out the address the Wednesday before the party. Look for it in your email!
item.name: Gady's birthday party
